translations: （船）倾覆；（使船）倾覆（capsize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I am in danger of capsizing.
I didn't count on his capsizing the raft.
sentences.translation: 我没有想到他会把筏子弄翻。

sentences.sentence: Crew do not have to position body weight to prevent capsizing (see photo).
sentences.translation: 水手们不必用体重来防止倾覆(见上图)。
